Google Inc( GOOG) wants to avoid a lengthy legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying. We certainly want to avoid that, Eric Schmidt told the paper in an interview. "I think it is in our interests and I would hope in their interests to a do a quick analysis of concerns that have been raised by competitors,

back-to-back 3-pointers that gave the Pistons the lead for good and sent them to a 107-102 victory over the Golden State Warriors on Thursday night. "That really hurt my feelings, that tip," Rasheed Wallace said. You can't let that frustrate you. I missed two point-blank foul shots. I'm upset at myself about that. You can't let that one thing get you down. That's what we did, just dug deep and came up with some stops down the stretch. Richard Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson . - With Chinese Barack Obama Hu Jintao on a state visit to George Washington , a US senator expressed disbelief Wednesday that a major museum in the US capital sells only "crafted in China" busts of US presidents. That is pretty pathetic! I was not aware that the collapse of our manufacturing base had gone that far, Independent Barack Obama Sen. Bernie Sanders said in a letter to the director of the National Museum of George Washington History. Sen.
